subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: A room where food for sale is processed, manufactured, prepared, deposited, treated, stored or packed, that does not have direct communication with a room containing sanitary facilities, living quarters, laundry, bathroom or garage or a room where animals are housed, satisfies TAS I4P9(b).

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: ‘Direct communication’ means a doorway, a window or other opening in a wall between a food preparation or storage area opening directly on to a room described in (1).

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Access between the areas referred to in (2) via another room, a hallway, or an airlock, satisfies TAS I4P9(b).
